title: If the land is reserved considering its geographical location like Bio-Diversity Proposal, Nallah training reservation etc
clause_text: If the land is reserved considering its geographical location like Bio-Diversity Proposal, Nallah training reservation etc. and; Unless the relocation is within area covered by the layout or development permission under sanction.
section: 3.11 RELOCATION OF D.P. / R.P. SITES / ROADS

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: If the land is reserved considering its geographical location like Bio-Diversity Proposal, Nallah training reservation etc. and;
